nodes.name: Start
nodes.dialogue: Good morning. I trust everything is in order? Ah right I do remember your oath to serve in silence. Very well, I'd like to discuss a few matters with you. Are you ready?

nodes.name: Out of Line
nodes.dialogue: No? Then I'd suggest drinking caffine before reporting for duty. I need employees who are prepared for any situation at a moment's notice. So with that in mind, let's begin. As you've probably noticed, our mechanisms are a bit outdated but here at _________, we value our roots. Your job will be to maneuver this lever and take guests to their designated floors. Go ahead and operate that lever now.
